name: Tank my Bug
description:
This is a two player game. 0% Bugs 100% Features. Shoot your friend on your local PC.

Player 1:

Move: WASD

Shoot: E

Player 2:

Move: Arrow Keys

Shoot: [-]

Source: https://github.com/PhoenixofForce/Kenney_Jam_1

(if you cant start the game from the main menu, try every button ;))
